Instead of using generic `
` containers you can use semantic containers. A semantic element clearly describes its meaning to both the browser and the developer. Like this: ```

For more projects, please visit my architectural portfolio website!

` on line `13` instead of generic `

All your images look great and have a proper `alt` text set that describes what they are.
Nice! You added a Google Font to enhance the webpage's typography.
